channel.title: DiversityX The Features Are Upon You
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][u][b]DiversityX [/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=36pt][u][b]About DiversityX [/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][u][b]We as a team want to give you the best adventure you have ever had on an RSPS. We want to give you the best features you can possibly handle. We strive for the most success and we want to give it to you. We are willing to give you updates everyday and we want people asking for more updates so we are able to add them. Ever since I was familiar with RSPS I wanted to start a 2006-2007 remake but I never had the motivation to. Now that I have actually came to this point it's just I want to do the best that I possibly can and keep everyone satisfied. We want you to stick to your chairs like it is glue. This RSPS will be different then the rest and we count on you guy's for our feedback and for our players![/b][/u][/center]
[center][b]There is way to many features to list my content folder started at like 2-3 files it now has over 25+
Hence the pictures you see that are the old graphics well here's a tip look at these ![/b][/center]
[img]http://puu.sh/44f94.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44bo2.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44f94.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44EXd.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44Fba.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44KIt.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44Oz1.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44QGL.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44QHd.jpg[/img]
Another minigame [img]http://puu.sh/4b4nf.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4b4pq.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4b4we.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4b4xI.png[/img]
[center]- New black marks system. Staff only [img]http://puu.sh/4cjAR.png[/img]Use as ::givemark (amount) (name) [img]http://puu.sh/4cjG8.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/4cjJp.png[/img] Admins can remove and give. Mods can only give.
- Double Experience for weekends, also made a command so I can do it anytime! [img]http://puu.sh/4csSX.png[/img] It is also ran on events
- Control when double Pkp points starts. Very useful. [img]http://puu.sh/4csSX.png[/img]
- Random Event - What Is? [img]http://puu.sh/4dcXq.png[/img]
- Recipe for disaster interface. [img]http://puu.sh/4dRyI.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]Features
[center][u][b]Custom minigames one of many. Perfect combat system Perfect skilling zones We have a wide range of characters from all over the world waiting to play! ECO based community Flawless switching as soon as you click the item it switches right away NO LAG Choose your own experience. With rewards from EXTREME+ You can go where ever you want meaning most of the ladders and doors work Working obelisk in the wild so you can teleport from lower to higher in the wilderness Balance stats for the amours and items Perfect Experience Rates [/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt][u][b]Minigames - 20%[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][b]Custom Minigames Pest Control Castle Wars Barrows Warriors Guild[/COLOR] Duel Arena Every rule working Staking items Utilizes every dueling arena, finds an arena based on players dueling in each one Second staking interface stacks items correctly Duels can tie Obstacle arenas and non-obstacle arenas Checks inventory space to make sure you have space to make a stake TzHarr Fight Cave TzHarr Fight Pits[/b][/center]
[center][b]Music/Sound System - 5%[/b][/center]
[center][b]Music by region[/b] [b]Fading Weapon sounds Global sound system, you hear what's happening around you NPC sounds Skilling sounds Misc. sounds Random sounds (birds chirping, etc)[/b][/center]
Skills - 90%
Prayer - 90%
Burying bones Bones on altar Prayer bonus effects drain
Thieving- 100%
Picking pockets Thieving stalls Stunning
[center][b]Fishing - 85%[/b][/center]
[center]Small Net fishing Rod fishing Fly fishing Cage fishing Big Net fishing Harpoon fishing[/center]
[u][b]Firemaking - 90%[/b][/u]
[center]Bonfires Making fires Clipped Can't make on fires on other fires[/center]
[center][b]Woodcutting - 90%[/b]
Birdsnests Cutting trees Success formula with axes [/center] [center][b] Misc.
Following - 100% Default Following Dancing Combat Following NPC sizes Breadth-first search algorithm for players Clipping - 100% Map object clipping NPC tile clipping (NPCs can't walk on each other) NPC size support for all clipping Object validation Projectile clipping Ground Items - 100% Stacking Global and local Ownership Queuing for loading mass ground items at one time
Banking - 100%
Inserting and withdrawing Swapping and inserting Noting and un-noting Inventory - 100% Adding items Removing items Shopping - 100% Shops re-stock items General stores slowly remove items they're sold Updates every open shop when an item is sold/bought/re-stock/un-stocked Trading - 100% Exchanging items, declining/accepting trades Shows items on second screen Trades should never dupe/lose items Clan Chat - 90% Joining, leaving, and talking in clan chats Join lobby names instead of player's clan chats, first to lobby is the owner
[/b][/center]
[center][size=18pt][u][b]MEDIA for the old graphics ect[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://puu.sh/3VsV6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3VsY1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3VsZv.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Old pictures. When I first started :)![/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Credits: [/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][b]Lost Valentino for his 2007 base known as ArdechePK. It was pretty much nothing when I started now it's atleast something Accquital I think how he spells his name Jason, for his slayer Logic buddy from r-s. Really good client Developer few more just not listing yet As well as myself for a lot of the content![/b][/center]
[center][size=18pt][u][b]Thank you and have a wonderful day![/b][/u][/size][/center]

item.title: DiversityX The Features Are Upon You
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

arham 4:

Most Advanced 2007? I year can’t be advanced.

Yeah I didn’t update my thread it was 2007 till I said w.e I haven’t switched that yet it’s the least of my worries. I don’t download change names and then host. People shall know that by now.

Read full topic
item.source: DiversityX The Features Are Upon You

item.title: DiversityX The Features Are Upon You
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

Yes I know lol. It needs to be revamped that’s for sure here is an update log

August 16th-August 25th

[code]Rememeber this was oringally a 2007, now that it’s 317 loading 634 items I have to change a bunch of the items to make them compatiable !!

wait this is the old graphics

this is the new graphics
I added
wait
getting pics

http://puu.sh/44f94.jpg
http://puu.sh/44bo2.png
http://puu.sh/44f94.jpg
http://puu.sh/44EXd.jpg
http://puu.sh/44Fba.jpg
http://puu.sh/44KIt.jpg
http://puu.sh/44Oz1.jpg
http://puu.sh/44QGL.jpg
http://puu.sh/44QHd.jpg

August 16th 2013

  • Music is started needs work
  • Sound effects are started needs work
  • Weight Definitions is started needs work
  • Nearly full pottery was added needs a lot of work.
  • Fully working teleport tabs, Camalot,lumbridge,varrock,falador ECT when using them it crashes your client yet it still teleports you. You will have to reload it. Will look into this later
  • Fully working zombie head animations ID=6722
  • Fully working yo-yo ID=4079
  • Fireworks
  • Added the pmod room from runescape for pmods and jmods 3190, 9828
  • Added bonfires
  • Teleporting was rewritten, now when you teleport you may even get experience
  • Added IDLE LOGOUT, say you are afking for 5 minutes + it will log you out

August 17th 2013

  • Ava’s Accumulator should give 2 arrows every 500-600ms if it’s being worn
  • New 525 gameframe
  • Loading 634 items
  • Loading 634 char models
  • Loading 667 NPCS
  • Loading 602 animations and gfx
  • Had to change whips animation to 602+ or else it would look garbage

August 18th 2013

  • Crown beside name (without talking)
  • Curse prayers done client sided, through cache NEEDS TO BE FINISHED SERVER SIDED!
  • Items kept on death interface
  • New equipment screen
  • Allowing symbols in chatbox
  • Godswords with proper animations now fixed
  • Pet system needs some work but is added now, disabled for now redoing this, the code was not neat at all
  • Added GrindingAction known as Pestle And Mortar
  • Fixed The Appearance Bug, known as sending fake packets to make yourself invisible
  • Fixed the duel arena interface dupe
  • Patched some more duel arena glitches
  • Fixed trade and Relog Dupe
  • Run Energy with perfect formula + toggling
  • Better runecrafting base
  • Removed farming and slayer till I can get a better base for both
  • Holiday drops sorta like the runescape spawns happening now

August 19th 2013

  • Fixed a trading dupe
  • Farming now is redone, it used to disconnect when you tried to farm, still needs a bunch of work
  • Ring of vigor now works just need the models
  • Fixed another dupe that big servers have. Not saying what it is or how it works
  • Fully working KDR
  • Added a minigame type ::ice in game, more then less it’s a custom
  • Added good and evil points
  • Money vault fully functional ::store adds your money ::check checks it and ::withdrawl takes out MAX CASH FOR NOW
  • Ring Of Life is now functional

August 20th 2013

  • There was hardly any updates today, had a lot of in real life stuff to take care of I am doing some as we speak

August 21th 2013

  • New skillguides interfaces for pretty much every stat. Besides hitpoints here is a picture http://puu.sh/47hdT.png
  • Might consider disabling dropping.
  • Added some random events can be looked at here. http://puu.sh/47Itc.jpg including rivertroll, tree spirit and 2 others
  • Decent Fading
  • Added a different way to keep logging information clean needs more work then what it has.
  • Mystery Box is now added and fully working giving common, uncommon, rare rewards

August 22th 2013

No updates been busy with in real life stuff yet again I am sorry

August 23th 2013

-Fixed the ardy lever it didn’t work before now it works.

August 24th 2013

  • Just started to work on it was busy all day with some issues. All resolved now. Let’s bring some more constant updates like before!
  • Item Gathering Task
  • Quick little fix that is EXPLAINED Player 1 challenged 2 twice. 2 Accepts. 1 puts up an item. 2 quickly walks away and 1 loses their item.
  • Veracs hitting through prayer
  • Some updates I had to redo. I will explain later on. Not many but some I did
  • Ring of dueling now can teleport you to barrows, Duel arena and fightcaves. Never worked before
  • Reduced some more lag like I always do. Rewriting stuff in the source only just makes it 100X better even if it’s done right there is usually other methods to make it better and a lot damn cleaner
  • New way to handle random events!

August 25th 2013

  • Went away and came back lot’s of updates to come hopefully
  • Fixed basket of eggs. Now correct animations ect
  • Added reputation system in game. The class needs a lot of work.
  • Added God Cape Claiming at mage bank. Better system as well as a better class for it to be handled
  • Alch low and high both fixed
  • Fixed a random T2 error
  • Added a basic infraction system ingame ::infract
  • Better way to handle pest control rewards. Rewrote a new class for it
  • Added ::dice
  • Rangers Guild is now completed was unable to add it last time. Actually sat down rewrote a copy of it and made it fine.
  • Started to work on a dwarf multi cannon base but not finishing yet
  • New Calendar Event System. Took awhile to config and put together.
  • Double experienced weekends will now be automatic when I code it shortly. Back on topic it’s finished. Enjoy
  • Added ectophial
  • New minigame here is a sneak peak
    http://puu.sh/4b4nf.jpg
    http://puu.sh/4b4pq.png
    http://puu.sh/4b4we.png
    http://puu.sh/4b4xI.png
  • Kill all 4 bosses you can unlock ancients. I might keep the altar at home not to sure and also open a shop for ancients as well enjoy![/code]

August 25th-August 30th A lot of content added between 5 days!

[code]August 26th 2013

  • There was over 20 updates I did but I backed it up because of an issue. It’s okay. I will get to them asap
  • I am now going to bed been up for 2 days straight working and programming are killing ,me

August 27th 2013

  • Going on vacation for a week. Will not be home till 2nd-4th of september.
  • Cheat client, bank from anywhere fix
  • New way to handle all the Magic Staves much cleaner may use more memory though
  • New black marks system. Staff only http://puu.sh/4cjAR.png Use as ::givemark (amount) (name) http://puu.sh/4cjG8.png http://puu.sh/4cjJp.png Admins can remove and give. Mods can only give.
  • Dragon armour trimming
  • Tool Leprechaun Produce Exchanging
  • Double Experience for weekends, also made a command so I can do it anytime! http://puu.sh/4csSX.png
  • New Text Handler
  • Bow Stringing
  • Battlestaffs
  • New way to handle beverages in game. I added many. Still need to do more!
  • Stupid Looping for items… It’s now fixed how it should be.
  • Cheat Engine Dupe Fix
  • Control when double Pkp points starts. Very useful. http://puu.sh/4csSX.png
  • new ::staff command works nice to find out who is actually on.
  • added timed mutes, might need a bit of work!
  • Started the MIME event
  • Essence Pouches
  • Total Level Milestones
  • Made it so when you type a command it doesn’t always have to be lowercase it can be either uppercase or lower case easy fix
  • Commands - getNpcId/getNpcName
  • Scythe is now fixed
  • Eggs are now fixed
  • Sled is also now fixed
  • Correct food eating delay it was 450 now it is 1800. It’s like runescape wiki now !
  • Kill messages have now been fixed properely
  • Staff Creation
  • Fixed Farcasting

August 28th 2013

  • Random Event - What Is? http://puu.sh/4dcXq.png
  • Started the chaos tunnels, going to be a long time to perfect them
  • Started Lost City needs a lot of work still. Good base for me though
  • More Trapdoor handling methods
  • Unique Way to Imbue Rings
  • Barrage Orb on NPC
  • Battle Staff Enchantment Shop

August 29th 2013

  • Updates coming, As you know school starts well I was honestly stupid. I would of had my grade 12 already but I fooled around during school. Something I wish I could of changed but you can’t. Just makes you who you are. I only need 10 credits but I will impress you right now. Okay last september I started with 10 credits, I now have 26!. Only 4 more to go I will get those really fast for you guys!
  • Open up bank method is totally different now
  • Bank pins are now added but THEY DO NOT SAVE YET.
  • Started a reset tablet. Needs some work meaning the interface and clickingbuttons needs to be added
  • Recipe for disaster interface. http://puu.sh/4dRyI.png
  • New dungeon added for skeletons. Not finished. I have been starting a lot of stuff and not finishing everything. Using for future reference so we have it later!
  • New gambling you bet what flower you think Party pete will plant 500k-10m. If it comes up as your colour you get what you bet. There is 5 colours http://puu.sh/4dSop.jpg, http://puu.sh/4dSqQ.jpg
  • Mithril Seeds have now been added
  • Water filling used by events.
  • Rewards handling
  • Phoenix necklace
  • Spinning plate animation
  • Added a newspaper, not finished just started for the future. I plan ahead.
  • Sinister chest added. Just need to place it somewhere
  • Added killcount and pk points better. Say you die 100 times it will say. WOW JUST WOW BRO. You also get rewarded with cash and whips. From pking.
  • Added an auto mute to avoid spammers!
  • So I’v played a few servers where you just gather materials and when the service is complete you get rewarded and it doesn’t involve combat/skilling. You get 250 bananas and get 2.5m in exchange for trading them
  • Kill Timer What it does? Starts an individual timer when each player enters combat, Stops the timer when a player is out of combat for 10 seconds, Stops the timer when a player dies, Handles the amount of time it takes to kill a player and feeds it to the killer, Handles achievements, Includes saving.
  • There used to be only 8 block emotes for weapons armour ect. Now there is over 300 easiliy. Anything you can think of such as granite maul, master wand, teacher wand, bronze 2h, Flameburst defender. There is wayyyyyy to much to list lol
  • Gertrudes cat quest I removed this the dialogues were acting up >.< I will redo it later on JUST PLEASE REMIND ME!
  • Ban system is now more neat and organized
  • Added an akward armadyl storm it’s actually used as the smoke blitz spell
  • Combat dummies now work just not for xp yet. Just for max hit calculations
  • RUNECRAFTING IS NEARLY FINISHED :D. Way before it did not work!
  • Thinking about adding christmas, easter, and halloween events.
  • Added a interest rate, just like real life banking! Say you store money, you build interest on it everyday!
  • Went from 1200 warnings to 1000. Still a lot to do.
  • Went from 1000 warnings down to 950 also had some retard, help me add something then produced over 400 errors to fix YAY me lol.

August 30th 2013

  • Chaotic shield effects
  • Correct slayer helm effect
  • Bone necklaces effects there was 3
  • Well since its quite ugly showing health below 0 theres an easy fix for that I just did
  • Saving on destruct (When you X the client)
  • New fight caves, jad won’t spawn
  • Jad now spawns and fixed all the bugs with this
  • Instant item appearance in wilderness
  • correct dharoks formula
  • 95% Enchanting jewerly
  • Evil chicken random event
  • FreakyForester random event
  • Sandwich lady random event
  • Spirit tree random event edited
  • [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: DiversityX The Features Are Upon You
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[center][size=36pt]DiversityX [/size][/center]

[center][size=36pt]About DiversityX [/size][/center]

[center]We as a team want to give you the best adventure you have ever had on an RSPS. We want to give you the best features you can possibly handle. We strive for the most success and we want to give it to you. We are willing to give you updates everyday and we want people asking for more updates so we are able to add them. Ever since I was familiar with RSPS I wanted to start a 2006-2007 remake but I never had the motivation to. Now that I have actually came to this point it’s just I want to do the best that I possibly can and keep everyone satisfied. We want you to stick to your chairs like it is glue. This RSPS will be different then the rest and we count on you guy’s for our feedback and for our players![/center]

[center][b]There is way to many features to list my content folder started at like 2-3 files it now has over 25+

Hence the pictures you see that are the old graphics well here’s a tip look at these ![/b][/center]









Another minigame



[center]- New black marks system. Staff only Use as ::givemark (amount) (name) Admins can remove and give. Mods can only give.

  • Double Experience for weekends, also made a command so I can do it anytime! It is also ran on events

  • Control when double Pkp points starts. Very useful.

  • Random Event - What Is?

  • Recipe for disaster interface. [/center]

[center][size=12pt][b]Features

[center][u]Custom minigames one of many.
Perfect combat system
Perfect skilling zones
We have a wide range of characters from all over the world waiting to play!
ECO based community
Flawless switching as soon as you click the item it switches right away
NO LAG
Choose your own experience. With rewards from EXTREME+
You can go where ever you want meaning most of the ladders and doors work
Working obelisk in the wild so you can teleport from lower to higher in the wilderness
Balance stats for the amours and items
Perfect Experience Rates [/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Minigames - 20%[/size][/center]

[center]Custom Minigames
Pest Control
Castle Wars
Barrows
Warriors Guild[/COLOR]
Duel Arena
Every rule working
Staking items
Utilizes every dueling arena, finds an arena based on players dueling in each one
Second staking interface stacks items correctly
Duels can tie
Obstacle arenas and non-obstacle arenas
Checks inventory space to make sure you have space to make a stake
TzHarr Fight Cave
TzHarr Fight Pits[/center]

[center]Music/Sound System - 5%[/center]

[center]Music by region
Fading
Weapon sounds
Global sound system, you hear what’s happening around you
NPC sounds
Skilling sounds
Misc. sounds
Random sounds (birds chirping, etc)[/center]

Skills - 90%

Prayer - 90%

Burying bones
Bones on altar
Prayer bonus effects drain

Thieving- 100%

Picking pockets
Thieving stalls
Stunning

[center]Fishing - 85%[/center]

[center]Small Net fishing
Rod fishing
Fly fishing
Cage fishing
Big Net fishing
Harpoon fishing[/center]

Firemaking - 90%

[center]Bonfires
Making fires
Clipped
Can’t make on fires on other fires[/center]

[center]Woodcutting - 90%

Birdsnests
Cutting trees
Success formula with axes
[/center]
[center][b] Misc.

Following - 100%
Default Following
Dancing
Combat Following
NPC sizes
Breadth-first search algorithm for players
Clipping - 100%
Map object clipping
NPC tile clipping (NPCs can’t walk on each other)
NPC size support for all clipping
Object validation
Projectile clipping
Ground Items - 100%
Stacking
Global and local
Ownership
Queuing for loading mass ground items at one time

Banking - 100%

Inserting and withdrawing
Swapping and inserting
Noting and un-noting
Inventory - 100%
Adding items
Removing items
Shopping - 100%
Shops re-stock items
General stores slowly remove items they’re sold
Updates every open shop when an item is sold/bought/re-stock/un-stocked
Trading - 100%
Exchanging items, declining/accepting trades
Shows items on second screen
Trades should never dupe/lose items
Clan Chat - 90%
Joining, leaving, and talking in clan chats
Join lobby names instead of player’s clan chats, first to lobby is the owner

[/b][/center]

[center][size=18pt]MEDIA for the old graphics ect[/size][/center]

[center]

[/center]

[center]Old pictures. When I first started :)![/center]

[center][size=24pt]Credits: [/size][/center]
[center]Lost Valentino for his 2007 base known as ArdechePK. It was pretty much nothing when I started now it’s atleast something
Accquital I think how he spells his name
Jason, for his slayer
Logic buddy from r-s. Really good client Developer
few more just not listing yet
As well as myself for a lot of the content![/center]

[center][size=18pt]Thank you and have a wonderful day![/size][/center]
